description:
Bonobono hears that Baby Bear has a cold and sets out right away to visit him. He runs into Boss Bear hiding in the trees. It seems Boss Bear came because he heard about Baby Bear`s cold, but doesn`t want anyone to see him. Bonobono shows him a secret path to take.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: コヒグマくんがカゼをひいた
